I am currently the Scholarly Services Librarian at Oklahoma State University. I graduated from the School of Information at the University of Texas in 2011 with an MS in Information Studies, and from Texas State University in 2006 with a BA in History. I previously worked at the University of Houston-Clear Lake and the University of Texas at Arlington. 

I am interested in:
* the history, economics, and sociology of scholarly publishing; open access, open education, & open data; copyright & fair use; research evaluation; citation analysis; peer review
* The evolution of American presidential & congressional power from 1945-the present; Cold War geopolitics, imperialism/anti-imperialism
* Autofiction; the I Ching; [My Big TOE](my-big-toe.com)
